mapper.insert: INSERT INTO DAILY_PLAN(NUM, SEQ, ACTIVITY_DATE, TEACHER_ID, LOCATION, TARGET, GRADE, SUBJECT, GOALS, MATERIALS, REG_DATE, UPD_DATE) VALUES(#{num}, #{seq}, #{activityDate}, #{teacherId}, #{location}, #{target}, #{grade}, #{subject}, #{goals}, #{materials}, SYSDATE(), SYSDATE())
INSERT INTO ACTIVITY(NUM, PLAN_NUM, ACTIVITY_TIME, CONTENT, NOTE, REG_DATE, UPD_DATE) VALUES(#{num}, #{planNum}, #{activityTime}, #{content}, #{note}, SYSDATE(), SYSDATE())
mapper.select: SELECT DAILY_PLAN.*, TEACHER.NAME AS INSTRUCTOR_NAME FROM DAILY_PLAN LEFT JOIN TEACHER ON (DAILY_PLAN.TEACHER_ID = TEACHER.ID) ORDER BY DAILY_PLAN.REG_DATE DESC
SELECT * FROM TEACHER WHERE NAME LIKE CONCAT('%', #{keyword}, '%')
